SELECT t1.id, t1.module_code as moduleCode, t2.module_value as moduleValue, t1.parent_group_code as parentGroupCode, t1.group_code as groupCode, t1.dict_key as dictKey, t1.dict_value as dictValue, t1.dict_describe as dictDescribe, t1.sort, t1.created_time as createdTime FROM tb_sys_dict t1 LEFT JOIN tb_sys_module t2 on t1.module_code = t2.module_code WHERE t1.record_status = 1
and t1.module_code = #{moduleCode,jdbcType=TINYINT}
and t1.group_code like CONCAT('%', #{groupCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and t1.dict_key like CONCAT('%', #{dictKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and t1.dict_value like CONCAT('%', #{dictValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
ORDER BY t1.group_code ASC,t1.sort ASC
